name: tumblr - Control Panel Icon Tool(s)
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Replaces right control panel icons with a color of your choice. This style is not automatic and requires a bit of work.
additional_info: A graphics application is required to manipulate the resulting screenshot. The graphics application must be capable of removing the background color and saving the image as a transparent background PNG or GIF file. This image can be stored locally, on an image storage site, or converted to data URI. The steps: 1) Select Icon Template background color (black or white) 2) Select new Icon Color 3) Install the style or select the Preview button (FF only). 4) Take a screenshot of your tumblr dashboard. Cut the mini-icon set from the top of the screen. Cut inside the green outline. Final image dimensions should be 120w X 50h. Remove the white or black background. Save edited image. 5) Return to this style page. For Icon Positioning, select Install Style. 6) Provide your new icon image URL. The style should take care of positioning.

style_setting_options.label: Black
